game.name: Uncrashed : FPV Drone Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Amateur or experienced FPV pilot, learn or improve your skills on Uncrashed,the new ultra realistic FPV simulator. Simulate your own FPV drone with settings based on real values and you will have the same feeling as a real flight without the risk of breaking your drone !
